# Priyanshu Garg

> Full Stack Developer | SDE-1 at Plivo | Open Source Builder

## About

Priyanshu Garg is a Full Stack Developer currently working as SDE-1 at Plivo (since August 2025). Based in India, he builds scalable web applications and developer tools using Go, React, TypeScript, Node.js, and cloud technologies. He is passionate about open source, developer experience, and AI-assisted development.

## Current Role

**Software Development Engineer (SDE-1) at Plivo** (Aug 2025 - Present)
- Building cloud communications platform powering SMS, Voice APIs, and AI agents for 190+ countries
- Working on scalable systems serving 1B+ API requests monthly
- Tech stack: Go, React, TypeScript, AWS, PostgreSQL

**Previous: Software Engineer Intern at STGI Technologies** (Jul 2024 - May 2025)
- Contributed to fintech solutions modernizing financial institutions
- Worked on cloud-native lending platforms and banking software

## Technical Skills

### Languages
Go, TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, Java, C/C++, Swift, SQL

### Frontend
React.js, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Three.js, SwiftUI

### Backend
Node.js, Express.js, Go/Cobra, RESTful APIs, GraphQL, gRPC

### Databases
PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL, Redis

### Cloud & DevOps
AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS), Docker, GitHub Actions, CI/CD, Microservices

### AI & Tools
Claude Code, Cursor, GitHub Copilot, Ollama, Prompt Engineering

## Featured Projects

### Argus
The all-seeing code analyzer â€” CLI tool that scans codebases and generates AI-optimized context files for Claude, Cursor, Copilot, and more.
- Tech: Go, Cobra, AST parsing, Ollama, TypeScript
- Features: Multi-format output, monorepo per-workspace generation, Ollama AI enrichment, VS Code extension, parallel analysis, incremental scanning
- GitHub: https://github.com/Priyans-hu/argus
- Install: `go install github.com/Priyans-hu/argus/cmd/argus@latest`

### TokenMeter
macOS menu bar app for Claude Code token usage visualization.
- Tech: Swift, SwiftUI, macOS
- Features: Real-time token tracking, cost monitoring, session analytics
- GitHub: https://github.com/Priyans-hu/tokenmeter

### Ledger
Shop management system for Indian small businesses.
- Tech: React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Docker
- Features: Customer management, transaction tracking, GST invoicing, profit analytics
- GitHub: https://github.com/Priyans-hu/ledger

### UrbanKicks
E-commerce platform for urban footwear.
- Tech: React, Node.js, MongoDB
- Features: Product catalog, secure checkout, customer reviews
- GitHub: https://github.com/Priyans-hu/UrbanKicks

### StockFlow
Real-time inventory management system.
- Tech: React, Express, MongoDB
- Features: Stock tracking, order management, analytics dashboard
- GitHub: https://github.com/Priyans-hu/StockFlow

### PasteBox
Code snippet sharing platform.
- Tech: React, Node.js, Tailwind CSS
- Features: Syntax highlighting, shareable links
- GitHub: https://github.com/Priyans-hu/PasteBox
